overview: Mariah Chase is President of Sendthetrend.com. Previously, she President of Kara Ross New York; a luxury and fashion jewelry and handbag company. Prior to that she managed Christian Siriano while the SVP of Fashion at Designers Management Agency, where she provided business development services and executed Sirianoâ€™s licensing and media relationships, such as those with Payless, Puma, LG Mobile and Grand Central Publishing. While at DMA, Chase also worked with media and lifestyle clients such as Stardoll.com, Elle.com, QVC, Tucker by Gaby Basora, Frette, amongst others. Prior to DMA, Chase worked with myriad accessories companies in senior marketing and branding roles, both from the agency side and internally, including Jimmy Choo, Cole Haan, David Yurman, Roger Vivier, Jacob & Co, John Hardy, Officine Panerai and LeSportsac. She graduated from Harvard with an honors BA in American History.
